nodes.documentation:
@author Gerard Persoon
@title A simple casino, for educational purposes only
nodes.name: Casino

nodes.documentation: Setup an intial amount for the bank, supplied during the creation of the contract.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Not enough money in bank for this bet."

arguments.value: Not enough money in bank for this bet.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Not enough money in bank for this bet."

nodes.documentation:
Perform the bet and pay out if you win
@dev several temporary variables are created to make debugging easier
nodes.name: betAndWin

nodes.documentation:
Check the balance of the bank
@return the balance
nodes.name: getBankBalance
getRandom

nodes.documentation:
Deposit more funds for bank
@dev used when the bank runs out of money
